message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but $13,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can we meet somewhere in the middle of that and your previous offer of $11,000?
